name: Polygon Avail
intro: Modular blockchain focused on data availability
introduce: Avail is a blockchain that is laser-focused on data availability: ordering and recording blockchain transactions, and making it possible to prove that block data is available without downloading the whole block. This allows it to scale in ways that monolithic blockchains cannot. Off-chain scaling solutions can unlock their full potential by offloading data availability to Avail. Standalone chains can bootstrap validator security by using Avail for data availability.
